name: Enchanted Memories: A Freecell Journey
description:
A traditional solitaire game with a sad narrative to go with it. Do you recall the kind of friendships you had in the past? While playing this classic solitaire game, take a journey down memory lane.

Features:
- 80 levels
- Varying number of stacks, suits and free cells on every stage
- Mellow music, bittersweet story
